sense.gloss: to thrust (something) into (something), to cram, to stuff, to shove
to plunge into, to charge into, to rush into, to ram into, to crash into
to delve into (a matter), to go into depth, to get to the heart (of something)
to press (someone) about, to point out (e.g. an inconsistency), to question sharply, to grill
to get involved with, to meddle in, to poke one's nose into
to riposte, to retort, to quip

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑問題↑↓もんだい↓に↑鼻↑↓はな↓を|↑突↑↓つ↓っ↑込↑↓こ↓む|のはよしてくれよ。
sdata.e: Stop sticking your nose into other people's business.

sdata.j: ↑他人↑↓たにん↓のことに↑首↑↓くび↓を|↑突↑↓つ↓っ↑込↑↓こ↓む|な。
sdata.e: Don't pry into the affairs of others.

sdata.j: つまらないことに、↑首↑↓くび↓を|↑突↑↓つ↓っ↑込↑↓こ↓む|な。
sdata.e: Don't risk your neck over something foolish.
